xml.p: Introduction: "Ah, yes. I have predicted your arrival a long time ago, young @.#$e#However, your fate is ultimately in your own hands." #!String

accept_868: "Ah... an arctic shard.#$b#A most powerful substance, indeed, and potently infused with the element of ice.#$b#I'll take it, if you don't mind.#$b#...#$b#...Erm...You're still here. Oh. You want something?#$b#...Take this." #!String
MovieInvitation: "Hmm... I suppose I could accompany you... yes. Once you've arrived, I shall appear. Farewell." #!String
Mon: "Ah, yes. I have seen many things about your future, young @.#$e#If I were to tell you, there could be grave consequences." #!String
Tue: "If you have nothing important to tell me, leave me be. I have much work to do." #!String
Tue4: "I trust you enough to allow you in my basement. Treat what you find there with respect." #!String
Wed: "It takes years of study to understand the language of the elementals.#$e#To actually speak their language requires a lifetime of devoted effort.#$e#Now, if you'll excuse me..." #!String
Thu: "There are many mysteries around us. You must be patient if you wish to discover them." #!String
Thu10: "You musn't tell anyone... but I have reason to believe that one of the locals is actually my daughter...#$e#I could be mistaken... It's rare, but it does happen." #!String
Fri: "I believe the townsfolk are afraid of me.#$e#It is unfortunate, but I suppose it is human to be afraid of the unknown." #!String
Fri6: "I was married, long ago. After my wife and I split, she began flying around the countryside, cursing everything she saw.#$e#It's not a very mature way to express one's anger." #!String
Sat: "Beware, you are standing above a potent magical field.#$e#I built my hut right here on purpose, you know." #!String
Sat2: "Have you made any headway with the forest spirits?" #!String
Sun: "I sometimes observe the local villagers in secret.#$e#I am hoping to find an apprentice. Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue." #!String
